data.name: Shan Gui: Definitive Edition
data.detailed_description:
"Autumn is quiet. As the leaves fall, you can calm down to taste the life of each section."

It is the end of summer. Han Hui, a university student, meets a mysterious young girl named He Jia in the mountains. After this chance meeting, the two embark on a delightful journey.
 

KEY FEATURES

  • Both the 2012 and 2014 version image assets included, one game, two memories.
  • The resolution of all versions has been increased to 2560x1440.
  • The voices of He Jia and Han Hui were resampled to improve their sound quality; the voices of Li Qiucheng and the Teahouse Manager were re-recorded.
  • The remade ED of the 2014 version is sharper and plays more smoothly.
  • Clearer font rendering, better gamepad support, more language support.

Notice: The game selection box only pops up when launched through the Steam Library.

data.short_description: 洋红色秋天童话的起始。

fullgame.name: Shan Gui II: Sweet Osmanthus II

data.supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese, English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Hungarian, Turkish, Japanese, Polish, Korean
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 / DirectX 11
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS 10.10+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Apple silicon supported through Rosetta 2
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
